resources.string: This is a sample of android-gif-drawable Library: https://github.com/koral--/android-gif-drawable\nUsed icons are public domain or licensed under CC, GFDL.
This is a TextView with animated compound drawables
GifTextureView is available in API level 14+
Could not load GIF: %s. Tap to try again.
Click button below to toggle animation
GifTexImage2D requires OpenGL ES 2 or newer
